linkModule.name: Transgender People Banned from Military Service.
linkModule.description: Donald Trump's Presidential Action that bans Trans and Nonbinary people from serving in the military on account of being "Dishonorable, Mentally Ill, and Physically Unfit".

linkModule.name: DEI Banned from Military Service.
linkModule.description: Donald Trump's Presidential Action that cancels every DEI office in the DOD and the DHS. Also bans "Gender Ideology" as it is a "Divisive Concept".

linkModule.name: Restricted to Two officially recognized Sexes.
linkModule.description: Donald Trump's Presidential Action, "officially" stating that there are only two sexes. It bans the concept of gender and bans Transgender people's existence.

linkModule.name: Trans healthcare ban for people under 19.
linkModule.description: Donald Trump's Presidential Action, which bans and defunds trans healthcare, including hormones and surgeries, for people under 19.

linkModule.name: Ban on teaching Critical Race Theory and Gender.
linkModule.description: Donald Trump's Presidential Action, which bans schools from teaching people CRT as well as the concept of Transgender people, as it "erodes critical thinking". It also bans students social transitoning in schools.

linkModule.name: Article about Trans passport difficulties.
linkModule.description: The Michigan Advance's article about how the new policies and various government departments' responses have resulted in Transgender people getting barred from acquiring passports.

linkModule.name: Pentagon Leak stopping MLK Jr. Day and others from being remembered.
linkModule.description: CBS' article covering Pentagon Leaks preventing MLK Jr. Day, Juneteenth, Black History Month, Pride Month, and Holocaust Remembrance day from being recognized.

linkModule.name: Complete ban on DEI.
linkModule.description: Donald Trump's Executive Order banning the use of DEI in government department hiring processes as well as the private sector's hiring processes.

linkModule.name: CDC Retracts papers mentioning Transgender terms.
linkModule.description: A leak from Inside Medicine covering the CDC's reaction to  Trump's Executive Orders. Mentioning gender, transgender, nonbinary, and pregnant people will get your paper banned, along with similar terms.

linkModule.name: Project 2025.
linkModule.description: Information regarding Project 2025 - the Heritage Foundation's plan to dismantle the Department of Education, deport immigrants en masse, ban gender transition, and more. The download link is to the Internet Archive, since it's 900+ pages.

linkModule.name: V-Coding Wikipedia Page
linkModule.description: An explanation of the concept of V-Coding - intentionally placing Transgender Women in men's prisons for the men to abuse in order to "placate" the male prisoners.
